reviewText: I wish it was available on DVD. Replacing VHS tape.
Not what I thought it was going to be

My oldest son is now 32 and we have watched this moring since Focus on the Family first came out with the McGee and Me videos.
It is a tradition to watch it and every year without fail your heart is filled with the love of our Father who sent us the gift of Jesus as we watch a boy put feet to the Gospel.  Have a box of tissues near by.  I hope it becomes a family tradition for you.
